entity.name: audio_visual_item
entity.query: SELECT items.id AS id, items.call_number AS call_number, items.title AS title, items.container_note AS container_note, items.recording_location AS recording_location, items.item_date AS item_date, items.collection_id AS collection_id, items.format_id AS format_id, items.created_at AS created_at, items.updated_at AS updated_at, types.id AS type_id, collections.name AS collection_name, formats.name AS format_name, TRIM(TRAILING 'Item' FROM items.subclass_type) AS type_name FROM audio_visual_items AS items LEFT JOIN collections ON items.collection_id = collections.id LEFT JOIN formats ON items.format_id = formats.id LEFT JOIN media_types AS types ON TRIM(TRAILING 'Item' FROM items.subclass_type) = types.name WHERE items.deleted_at is null;

entity.name: cut
entity.query: SELECT id, performer_composer, title FROM cuts WHERE call_number='${audio_visual_item.call_number}' ORDER BY id
